ARABIC: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًا مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then they will have a boiling brew to drink on top of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Washing it down with boiling water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then on top of it they will have a brew of boiling water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Then they will have on top of it a mixture of boiling water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then after it, indeed for them is the drink of boiling hot water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then on the top of that they will be given boiling Hamim.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then most surely they shall have after it to drink of a mixture prepared in boiling water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then on top of it they have a brew of boiling water,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And afterward, lo! thereupon they have a drink of boiling water
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: then in addition to it they shall have a draught of boiling water to drink;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And thereafter verily they shall have thereon a draught of balling water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: On top of that they will take a solution of scalding water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then on top of that they will be given a mixture made of boiling water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then on the top of that they will be given boiling water to drink so that it becomes a mixture (of boiling water and Zaqqum in their bellies).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On top of it they shall have a brew of boiling water,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then, on top of it, they will have a brew of boiling liquid.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then indeed, they will have after it a mixture of scalding water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:67] Then, lo!, on top of it they will have a brew of boiling water, which they drink and which mixes with what they have eaten and becomes a brew thereof.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And afterward, lo! thereupon they have a drink of boiling water) to go with the Zaqqum.
